MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in Ruthin Road and Llanarmon Road. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:38pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 4:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:42pm on 24th November 2020.
